channel.title: Electrical on Justin MK Lam | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Electrical on Justin MK Lam | Portfolio

item.title: ESP8266 Sous Vide Controller
item.description: Project Summary Objective: Create a small, modular controller to regulate the temperature of a water bath. Motivation: To get in on this cooking fad without dropping fat stacks of cash on an immersion circulator. Features: Crisp 0.96” OLED display Pushbutton rotary encoder provides simple user interaction Removable temperature plug through standard 3-pos audio connector Temperature controlled outlet to be used with any heating element (ie. rice cooker, slow cooker, etc.

item.title: A Minty-Fresh Power Pack
item.description: Before the ubiquity of powerbanks, there was nothing on the market to provide longer battery life for portable electronics. Connecting a female USB connector to four rechargable AA batteries opened up a new world of extended iPod playback. I built a simple, rechargable battery pack to keep the tunes playing on long road trips. The iPod is alive! President's Choice rechargable batteries and some janky wiring is all it took.
